subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Scott Hoch made it back-to-back wins on the Champions Tour. He made an 8-foot birdie putt on the last hole of regulation to get in a four-way playoff, then made another 8-footer on the first playoff hole to win The ACE Group Classic in Naples, Fla. Tom Jenkins, Tom Kite and Brad Bryant had already made their pars before Hoch putted.
snippet: Scott Hoch made it back-to-back wins on the Champions Tour. He made an 8-foot birdie putt on the last hole of regulation to get in a four-way playoff, then made another 8-footer on the first playoff hole to win The ACE Group Classic in Naples, Fla....
